Plytix Retailers SDK for Python Changelog
=========================================

Here you can see the full list of changes between each release.

Version 1.0.6
-------------

- Upgraded to use the new Retailers API v0.2.
- Updated `pictures` method of `products` service:

    - Removed origin parameter.
    - Added sizes parameter to get thumbnails of the products passed.
    - Added pagination support.

- Improvements in the models definition.



Version 0.2
-----------

- First public release.
